content: What is the best practice for responding to "create" requests that supply an invalid resource (according the associated StructureDefinition)? Respond with an OperationOutcome with a particular code? How should the details of the validation errors be communicated?
422 error with an operation outcome suplying the details in one or more issues
ok, thanks, i can see that each individual issue is coded, rather than coding the outcome as a "validation error"
